cc587943-8dc3-41b4-8df6-23e7cab600aa.description: Earners of this badge have completed a Wharton Online course. Earners are eligible for enrollment into the Wharton Online Alumni group on LinkedIn. It does not represent alumni status at The Wharton School or at the University of Pennsylvania.
cc587943-8dc3-41b4-8df6-23e7cab600aa.name: Wharton Online Alumni

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this credential, learners must earn a 70% mark or higher on all summative module quizzes in a Wharton Online course.

7360f5ff-8715-4e2d-83d6-9e0fd7918b86.description: Earners of this badge are able to create positive, productive and responsive organizational cultures for their people. They are able to cultivate an environment where employees can thrive and meet their goals for an organization. Earners can create cultural change at their organization, applying cutting edge research to practical, real-life work situations. The earners of this badge understand how to lead and can prepare and organization for its future.
7360f5ff-8715-4e2d-83d6-9e0fd7918b86.name: Leadership in the 21st Century

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this credential, learners must earn a 70% mark or higher on all summative module quizzes within Leadership in the 21st Century. This represents the learning and mastery of concepts covered in the following modules: Engaging Hearts and Minds, Understanding Work Styles, and Cultivating Originality, Purpose-Driven Leadership, Organizational Culture and Culture Change

5750d84e-6092-49cc-a53d-7a08bec364b1.description: Earners of this badge have the skills needed to motivate, organize, and reward people in their organization so they are able to thrive as a business and as a social organization. They hold a solid understanding of when to pursue new global opportunities, and when not to, so they maximize profits and growth. Earners are able to create a global strategy that takes advantage of new markets and opportunities, avoids common pitfalls, and makes sense for the firm and the bottom line.
5750d84e-6092-49cc-a53d-7a08bec364b1.name: Managing and Motivating Talent

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this credential, learners must earn a 70% mark or higher on all summative module quizzes within Managing and Motivating Talent. This represents the learning and mastery of concepts covered in the following modules: Motivation and Reward; Tasks, Jobs, and Systems of Work; Making Good and Timely Management Decisions; Designing and Changing the Organization's Architecture

2e15ea4a-1b4b-47bf-888e-c975ca134e74.description: Earners of this badge are able to evaluate, develop, and execute a successful business strategy that they can implement inside and outside of the organization. They can articulate their strategy, why it works, and how it will help meet the organization's financial and marketing goals. World-renowned management professors Harbir Singh and Nicolaj Siggelkow introduce tools and frameworks that can be put to immediate use in planning and execution.
2e15ea4a-1b4b-47bf-888e-c975ca134e74.name: Strategic Management: Competitive and Corporate Strategy

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this credential, learners must earn a 70% mark or higher on all summative module quizzes within Strategic Management: Competitive and Corporate Strategy. This represents the learning and mastery of concepts covered in the following modules: The Firm and the Industry, Industry Analysis and Competitive Dynamics, Corporate Strategy and Firm Scope, Firms in a Context

e41e471d-4ed8-4305-9983-128a3c191a81.description: Earners of this badge can leverage new mindsets, new decision models, new business models, and new products and services to maximize their firm’s potential. By exploring new international markets and their evolution, they can create a global structure and strategy to take advantage of global markets in order to maximize profits and growth.
e41e471d-4ed8-4305-9983-128a3c191a81.name: Managing the Global Firm

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this credential, learners must earn a 70% mark or higher on all summative module quizzes within Managing the Global Firm. This represents the learning and mastery of concepts covered in the following modules: Global Markets and the Firm, International Strategies, Organization and Management of the International Firm, The Multinational Firm in the 21st Century

d6b93ec8-8cfb-48f4-bf5c-6e2427de3494.description: Earners of the Leadership and Management Certificate have gained the skills necessary to help executives across the organization reach new levels of success. They are better equipped to engage and motivate employees, manage employee performance and evaluation, and create an optimal organizational architecture. Earners completing this certificate are able to create strategic leadership and vision.
d6b93ec8-8cfb-48f4-bf5c-6e2427de3494.name: Leadership and Management Certificate Program

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this credential, learners must earn a 70% mark or higher on all summative module quizzes within the Leadership and Management Certificate Program. This represents the learning and mastery of concepts covered in the following courses: Leadership in the 21st Century, Managing and Motivating Talent, Managing the Global Firm, Strategic Management: Competitive and Corporate Strategy

f7852b0c-162d-4682-8bac-0e4fe937d786.description: Earners of this badge are able to apply the fundamentals of Big Data, Artificial Intelligence, and Machine Learning to their organization's strategy. They are able to discuss the ethics and risks behind using AI, and governance frameworks for proper implementation.
f7852b0c-162d-4682-8bac-0e4fe937d786.name: AI for Business

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this credential, learners must earn a 70% mark or higher on all summative module quizzes within AI for Business.

a897603e-be46-4955-af5e-e07ef96fd8fe.description: Earners of this badge are able to evaluate digital marketing and social media methods and approaches as well as key e-commerce business models from a variety of perspectives.
a897603e-be46-4955-af5e-e07ef96fd8fe.name: Fundamentals of Digital Marketing, Social Media, and e-Commerce

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this credential, learners must earn a 70% mark or higher on all summative module quizzes within the course.

8f0ac768-4cec-43db-af0f-7b02538fbb82.description: Earners of this badge are able to craft contagious content, build stickier messages, and leverage social media to make any product or idea catch on. Having studied the foundations of consumer psychology, earners of this badge are able to apply the concepts of exposure, perception, and memory to influencing consumers and selling ideas.
8f0ac768-4cec-43db-af0f-7b02538fbb82.name: Selling Ideas: How to Influence Others and Get Your Message to Catch On

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this credential, learners must earn a 70% mark or higher on all summative module quizzes within Selling Ideas: How to Influence Others And Get Your Message to Catch On. This represents the learning and mastery of concepts covered in the following modules: Consumer Psychology: Exposure, Perception, and Memory; What Makes Ideas Sticky; How Social Influence Shapes Behavior; The Power of Word of Mouth: STEPPS; Social Networks

3bbac561-0f53-4a13-9b89-757d1ca8dc20.description: Wharton's Economics of Blockchain and Digital Assets program utilizes both theoretical frameworks and real-world applications and case studies to give students the tools necessary to engage deeply with this emerging technology in a business context.
3bbac561-0f53-4a13-9b89-757d1ca8dc20.name: Economics of Blockchain and Digital Assets

badge_template_activities.title: Learn more about the Wharton Economics of Blockchain and Digital Assets Online Certificate program here.
A minimum cumulative score of 70% is required to successfully complete this program.

98183bff-bd17-4709-9dc4-b1c2d4be965f.description: Earners of the Digital Marketing Professional Certificate can implement an omni-channel marketing plan, leverage marketing analytics, and create and utilize a social media strategy. They are data-driven customer-centric marketing professionals able to improve customer retention. Earners are able to use new techniques in digital market research, including regression analysis, conjoint analysis, and social media analysis.
98183bff-bd17-4709-9dc4-b1c2d4be965f.name: Digital Marketing Professional Certificate Program

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this credential, learners must earn a 70% mark or higher on all summative module quizzes within the Digital Marketing Professional Certificate Program. This represents the learning and mastery of concepts covered in the following courses: Fundamentals of Digital Marketing, Social Media, and E-Commerce, Marketing Analytics: Data Tools and Techniques, Managing the Value of Customer Relationships, Selling Ideas: How to Influence Others, and Get Your Message to Catch On.

a818ea9e-476a-4c9d-a4b5-f1229cc5ae77.description: Earners of this badge are able to apply the tools and strategies used to make data-driven decisions. They are able to assess critical managerial problems, develop relevant hypotheses, analyze data and, most importantly, draw inferences to create convincing narratives which yield actionable results.
a818ea9e-476a-4c9d-a4b5-f1229cc5ae77.name: Marketing Analytics: Data Tools and Techniques

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this credential, learners must earn a 70% mark or higher on all summative module quizzes within Marketing Analytics: Data Tools and Techniques. This represents the learning and mastery of concepts covered in the following modules: Introduction to Data Collection, Market Research, and Analysis; Regression Analysis: Modeling Cause and Effect; Conjoint Analysis: Valuing Attributes and Measuring Preference; Social Media Analytics

52f786eb-4b5b-4906-8306-7a9d476accdf.description: Earners of this badge are able to identify their most valuable customers and maximize their strategic value. They are able to make informed decisions related to customer centricity and choose metrics to gauge and guide ongoing customer-centric efforts.
52f786eb-4b5b-4906-8306-7a9d476accdf.name: Managing the Value of Customer Relationships

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this credential, learners must earn a 70% mark or higher on all summative module quizzes within Managing the Value of Customer Relationships. This represents the learning and mastery of concepts covered in the following modules: What are Customer Centricity, Customer Equity, Firm Valuation and CLV?; Managing Customers According to Lifetime Value in Contractual and Non-Contractual Settings; Acquiring Customers and Creating and Measuring their Value; Retention, Attrition and Development.

426d025e-0fa5-4adc-9271-f0860e453602.description: This badge represents one (1) professional CEU credit as earned through the completion of the requirements of a Wharton Online program of study. Earners are eligible to use this CEU where applicable to demonstrate current and refined business-oriented skills and to fulfill professional requirements. This CEU meets the rigorous IACET CEU standard and will remain active in good standing for seven (7) years.
426d025e-0fa5-4adc-9271-f0860e453602.name: 1 Continuing Education Unit (CEU)

badge_template_activities.title: To be eligible for this credential, learners must earn a 70% mark or higher on all summative module quizzes in a CEU-eligible Wharton Online course of study. Wharton Online CEUs meet the rigorous IACET CEU standard for continuing education and training.

283ad6b8-f5ba-469c-ae9c-540feb6865eb.description: Earners of this badge are able to inspire change within others and their organization by applying the REDUCE Framework. They are able to analyze the strengths and weaknesses of certain strategies for removing barriers in change, and also leverage those strategies to achieve change in both business and in life.
283ad6b8-f5ba-469c-ae9c-540feb6865eb.name: Removing Barriers to Change in Organizations

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this credential, learners must earn a 70% mark or higher on all summative module quizzes within Removing Barriers to Change in Organizations.

24b8c1b3-c96b-4838-9504-66185d45acb3.description: Earners of this badge will be able to craft a strategy that will propel their organizations to success in the global digital economy. They will also be able to navigate the risks of international expansion for their organizations and develop successful digital strategies for their business. By the end of this course, earners will have a foundational understanding of the global digital economy, and be able to design a strategy for success.
24b8c1b3-c96b-4838-9504-66185d45acb3.name: Managing in the Global Digital Economy

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this credential, learners must earn a 70% mark or higher on all summative module quizzes within Managing in the Global Digital Economy. This represents the learning and mastery of concepts covered in the following modules: The Growth of the Digital Economy, Digital Platforms and Network Effects, The Digital Transformation of Traditional Firms, and The Internationalization of Digital Firms.

skills.name: Identify Top Technology Trends That Enable The Digital Economy/ Transformation

738cd187-f338-4c43-907e-b0bd62cf6279.description: Earners of this badge are able to apply market-driven principles to their retail strategy so they are successful, in both online and offline world, as a retail brand. They can develop the right leadership approach in order to achieve business goals.
738cd187-f338-4c43-907e-b0bd62cf6279.name: Leadership in the Age of Digital Disruption

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this credential, learners must score 70% or higher on all module quizzes in Leadership in the Age of Digital Disruption. This represents the learning and mastery of the topics covered within the course: Analyzing disruptive changes within the retail industry, Examining successful retail strategies (beyond Amazon) and how to apply them, Leveraging customer decision-making research to increase sales, Understanding luxury and brand strategies and identifying what makes a brand truly great.

ce603891-61ea-4d1f-8028-924634cc7a87.description: Earners of this badge are able to apply the principles of destination-based marketing to achieve success in both the online and offline world as an omni-channel retail brand. They can develop leadership approaches to identify and target their best customers, apply customer-centric strategies to acquire and retain them, and differentiate their business through great customer experience. Earners can reach their audience and drive business in new and groundbreaking ways to achieve business success.
ce603891-61ea-4d1f-8028-924634cc7a87.name: Waze-Wharton Destination Marketing Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this credential, learners must score 70% or higher on all module quizzes in the Waze-Wharton Destination Marketing Certificate. This represents the learning and mastery of the following topics: Analyzing disruptive changes in retail, Examining and applying successful retail and marketing strategies, Leveraging customer decision-making research to increase sales, Customer centricity, customer equity, firm valuation and CLV, Customer Acquisition and creating and measuring customer value.

6869f6d3-a441-44df-9158-4d8c5fec3dbb.description: Earners of this badge are able to differentiate between passive and active investment strategies. They can complete a mean-variance analysis for a set of assets and assess the distribution of payoffs and returns. Earners are able to optimize asset utility using the capital asset pricing model (CAPM). They can leverage a diversified portfolio for better return on investments.
6869f6d3-a441-44df-9158-4d8c5fec3dbb.name: Fundamentals of Portfolio Management

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this credential, learners must meet all minimum passing criteria for all assignments and summative module quizzes within the course.

b29bfe2b-e00d-4b31-a101-a6c8a78f280f.description: Earners of this badge are able to assess the alpha and beta within equity funds. They can estimate and analyze the value of bond assets, as well as optimize credit risk by choosing the right bonds for portfolios. Earners are able to evaluate the effectiveness of commodities, money market funds, and mortgage-backed securities, all while enhancing ROI strategies using derivatives.
b29bfe2b-e00d-4b31-a101-a6c8a78f280f.name: Investment Products

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this credential, learners must meet all minimum passing criteria for all assignments and summative module quizzes within the course.

952d5aba-4446-417c-8b9a-97eb801d0c58.description: This badge represents four (4) professional CEU credit as earned through the completion of the requirements of a Wharton Online program of study. Earners are eligible to use these CEUs where applicable to demonstrate current and refined business-oriented skills and to fulfill professional requirements. These CEUs meet the rigorous IACET CEU standard and will remain active in good standing for seven (7) years.
952d5aba-4446-417c-8b9a-97eb801d0c58.name: 4 Continuing Education Units (CEUs)

badge_template_activities.title: To be eligible for this credential, learners must earn a 70% mark or higher on all summative module quizzes in a CEU-eligible Wharton Online course of study. Wharton Online CEUs meet the rigorous IACET CEU standard for continuing education and training.

54d037dd-9f68-42e8-a4ad-363a608c7768.description: Earners of this badge are able to implement the capital asset pricing model (CAPM) formula and other multi-factor asset pricing models. They can differentiate hedge, private equity, and venture capital funds from mutual fund strategies. Earners employ models of allocation to better analyze investment correlation and volatility. They are able to assist investors in assessing risk tolerance. Earners assess performance persistence and discuss whether past performance is indicative of future results
54d037dd-9f68-42e8-a4ad-363a608c7768.name: Asset Allocation

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this credential, learners must meet all minimum passing criteria for all assignments and summative module quizzes within the course.

3a6a7aa7-f4c0-4c38-bfbb-d0838bf89847.description: Earners of the Asset and Portfolio Management Certificate are able to employ best practices when putting together an investment portfolio. They are able to apply key terminology, investment products, and asset allocation strategies to maximize return on investments. Earners can assess opportunities, diversify portfolios, and manage investment risk.
3a6a7aa7-f4c0-4c38-bfbb-d0838bf89847.name: Asset and Portfolio Management Certificate Program

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of the Asset and Portfolio Management Certificate Program badge have successfully met all passing criteria in the courses Fundamentals of Portfolio Management, Investment Products, and Asset Allocation.

a1d75d75-e6fb-4f73-8f6f-cd4346ac01c1.description: Earners of this badge have developed the key skills needed to retain existing clients as well as to secure relationships with prospective high-net-worth clients. They have learned about the importance of Citi’s customer-centric approach in establishing lifetime value for clients. They have examined critical thinking concepts to enhance decision making processes as part of an initiative to improve strategic execution within the organization.
a1d75d75-e6fb-4f73-8f6f-cd4346ac01c1.name: Prospecting for Affluent and High-Net-Worth Clients

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this credential, participants must attend must complete all assignments with a passing grade within the Prospecting for Affluent and High-Net-Worth Clients.

78e1976e-1469-44aa-aca7-53be2a09335f.description: Earners of this badge know how technology has allowed firms to fundamentally change how they connect with their customers. They have examined the impact of connected strategies and business opportunities associated with those strategies and have evaluated existing technologies that can inform the design of connected relationships. They can identify different types of connected strategies and opportunities in a variety of business models to achieve success within an organization.
78e1976e-1469-44aa-aca7-53be2a09335f.name: Connected Strategy

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this credential, learners must earn a 70% mark or higher on all summative module quizzes within Connected Strategy.

67f19283-ca06-467e-8bd1-6901828ac623.description: Earners of this badge have developed the key skills to understand their client's needs, anticipate their possible objections, and create a win/win in a tough situation. They have learned to better understand emotions and how to use emotional intelligence when interacting with clients. They have developed the tools and tactics to build deeper relationships across their book of business at Citi.
67f19283-ca06-467e-8bd1-6901828ac623.name: Handling Client Objections

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this credential, participants must attend must complete all assignments with a passing grade within the Handling Client Objections course.

a348902d-fdf2-450c-9b4c-a360fd5782fa.description: Earners of this badge have developed the key skills needed to understand the intricate dynamics of negotiations. They have learned how to exchange information effectively, and how the information exchange process can influence negotiated outcomes. They understand methods for integrating bargaining and leveraging to gain information in an ethical manner. They are familiar with the role emotions play in negotiations and understand how to interact with others to yield successful outcomes.
a348902d-fdf2-450c-9b4c-a360fd5782fa.name: Negotiations

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this credential, learners must earn a 70% mark or higher on all summative module quizzes within Negotiations.

52f3960a-28af-4bb8-9f5c-d1e0f76bb970.description: Earners of the Digital Marketing Professional Certificate can adapt to changing business environments. They are skilled in developing effective digital strategies to support business goals, and incorporating new technologies into business operations. These achievers can implement strategic initiatives for digital platforms, and overcome roadblocks to organizational change.
52f3960a-28af-4bb8-9f5c-d1e0f76bb970.name: Digital Leadership Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this credential, learners must earn a 70% mark or higher on all summative module quizzes within the Digital Leadership Certificate Program. This represents the learning and mastery of concepts covered in the following courses: AI for Business, Leadership in the Age of Digital Disruption, Managing in the Global Digital Economy, and Removing Barriers to Change in Organizations.

8393c103-78d9-4592-af1e-a5572a2cae27.description: Earners of this badge are able to apply the fundamentals of Big Data, Artificial Intelligence, and Machine Learning to their organization's strategy. 66729858-5a6a-44f9-a75f-076d0d437cc2.description: Earners of this badge have developed the key skills to understand AI-powered applications that can enhance the customer journey and extend the customer lifecycle. They also learned how this AI-powered data can enable you to analyze consumer habits and maximize their potential to target your marketing to the right people.
66729858-5a6a-44f9-a75f-076d0d437cc2.name: AI Applications in Marketing & Finance

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this credential, participants must attend must complete all assignments with a passing grade within the course.

1379f4f5-1775-4d4b-b0e9-d61306555d43.description: Earners of this badge understand how to use quantitative models to transform data into better business decisions. They know how to use models to facilitate decision-making and how to structure decision-making for optimum results. They are able to create models of existing realities, possible risks, and alternative scenarios to determine the best solution for a business or enterprise.
1379f4f5-1775-4d4b-b0e9-d61306555d43.name: Decision-Making and Scenarios

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this credential, learners must earn a 70% mark or higher on all summative module quizzes within Decision-Making and Scenarios.

cdc93759-707c-4d23-b14f-0abd5e41b5d6.description: Earners of the Executive Leadership Certificate have the benefit of insights learned through taking Wharton Online's Leadership and Management and Digital Leadership series.

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of the Wharton Online Executive Leadership Certificate badge have completed all requirements of the courses within the Leadership and Management Certificate Program and the Digital Leadership Certificate, both offered by Wharton Online.

They know well the nuts and bolts of building a sales process, partnerships and supply r
b2001042-b708-4fd7-87a2-33c40800cfe8.name: Entrepreneurship 3: Growth Strategies

d3a44547-f795-442d-ba1e-4b8c0437afcb.description: Earners of this badge have examiend different financing models, including bootstrapping, organic growth, debt and risk capital, and also provides a clear overview of equity financing including the key types of investors: angels, venture capital, and crowdfunding. They are familiar with term sheets and the strategy associated with selecting exit modes. They understand what a successful business looks like and how it can be financed.
d3a44547-f795-442d-ba1e-4b8c0437afcb.name: Entrepreneurship 4: Financing and Profitability

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this credential, learners must earn a 70% mark or higher on all summative module quizzes within Entrepreneurship 4: Financing and Profitability.

064fbee3-3689-4b90-bfb1-edcd0a02939d.description: Earners of this badge have developed the key skills to understand the foundations upon which modern-day ESG was built, how market forces react to ESG, and ways to create and maintain value using ESG investment strategies. They also understand the five pathways of materiality, and how those interplay with or against ESG performance.
064fbee3-3689-4b90-bfb1-edcd0a02939d.name: ESG Risks and Opportunities

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this credential, participants must attend must complete all assignments with a passing grade within the course.

bc053f78-d3e7-4e1c-8431-9e7f349a5023.description: Earners of this badge are able to apply market-driven principles to their retail strategy so they are successful, in both online and offline world, as a retail brand. They can develop the right leadership approach in order to achieve business goals.
bc053f78-d3e7-4e1c-8431-9e7f349a5023.name: Leadership in the Age of Digital Disruption

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this credential, learners must score 70% or higher on all module quizzes in Leadership in the Age of Digital Disruption. This represents the learning and mastery of the topics covered within the course: Analyzing disruptive changes within the retail industry, Examining successful retail strategies (beyond Amazon) and how to apply them, Leveraging customer decision-making research to increase sales, Understanding luxury and brand strategies and identifying what makes a brand truly great.

2b428f4a-98d1-4350-a6c7-1ccad68a2356.description: Earners of this badge are able to identify their most valuable customers and maximize their strategic value. They are able to make informed decisions related to customer centricity and choose metrics to gauge and guide ongoing customer-centric efforts.
2b428f4a-98d1-4350-a6c7-1ccad68a2356.name: Managing the Value of Customer Relationships

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this credential, learners must earn a 70% mark or higher on all summative module quizzes within Managing the Value of Customer Relationships. This represents the learning and mastery of concepts covered in the following modules: What are Customer Centricity, Customer Equity, Firm Valuation and CLV?; Managing Customers According to Lifetime Value in Contractual and Non-Contractual Settings; Acquiring Customers and Creating and Measuring their Value; Retention, Attrition and Development.

413482e8-66f8-495d-be09-a7ce49531e55.description: Earners of this badge know how to create quantitative models to reflect complex realities by utilizing elements of risk and uncertainty. They have learned methods for creating predictive models for identifying optimal choices; and how those choices change in response to changes in the model’s assumptions. They understand the basics of the measurement and management of risk and are able to build models based on data.
413482e8-66f8-495d-be09-a7ce49531e55.name: Modeling Risk and Realities

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this credential, learners must earn a 70% mark or higher on all summative module quizzes within Modeling Risk and Realities.

cce23c81-573d-407e-a2bc-6d224d65a813.description: Earners of this badge have developed the key skills to understand AI and the strategies that are used in transforming business in order to gain a competitive advantage. They also developed the skills to understand the multitude of uses for AI in an enterprise setting and the tools that are available to lower the barriers to AI use.
cce23c81-573d-407e-a2bc-6d224d65a813.name: AI Strategy and Governance

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this credential, participants must attend must complete all assignments with a passing grade within the course.

40b45685-db72-4b45-9c0c-ac529e991277.description: Earners of this badge have learned the fundamentals of impact investing and developing a business strategy that drives social impact. They know how to become a leader who cultivates purpose and inspires change, measure societal impact through evidence-based models, and invest in ventures effectively and meaningfully. They have a deep understanding of the realities of leading an organization with purpose, and are able to build successful strategies that bring impactful change.
40b45685-db72-4b45-9c0c-ac529e991277.name: Business Strategies for Social Impact

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this credential, learners must earn a 70% mark or higher on all summative module quizzes within Business Strategies for Social Impact.

eb7f320b-e34e-444d-9155-5e71fff8bdb2.description: Earners of this badge have developed the key skills to understand climate change and the risks and opportunities that it creates for businesses in the 21st century. They also understand the current impacts of climate change on a global scale and the investment shifts that are required to achieve a net-zero economy.
eb7f320b-e34e-444d-9155-5e71fff8bdb2.name: ESG and Climate Change

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this credential, participants must attend must complete all assignments with a passing grade within the course.

99550fab-7e95-4d93-9bd0-862dec1bd9a4.description: Earners of this badge have developed the key skills to understand the impact of contemporary ESG ratings and how a company balances ESG issues against its financial performance. They also understand the effectiveness of corporate authenticity and the impacts of politics when building corporate ESG policy, as well as social activism’s ability to disrupt markets and the roles that stakeholders play when dealing with financial markets.
99550fab-7e95-4d93-9bd0-862dec1bd9a4.name: ESG and Social Activism

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this credential, participants must attend must complete all assignments with a passing grade within the course.

ba7066c8-dbe2-401d-afc6-a1f10920b425.description: Earners of this badge have developed the key skills to understand the importance of assessing stakeholder interest or salience in different ESG factors and industry variances. They also understand how to evaluate the importance of ESG factors in investment decisions, including how one can use them to create socially responsible portfolios with better-than-average returns.
ba7066c8-dbe2-401d-afc6-a1f10920b425.name: ESG Impact: Investor Perspective

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this credential, participants must attend must complete all assignments with a passing grade within the course.

d4521d80-f1a7-4e6d-8bf0-c6748e97e0ec.description: Earners of this badge have learned the foundational economic theories behind health care innovation and how to optimize their own health care practice or organization. They have gained a practical understanding of the theoretical frameworks of behavioral economics and operations management in the health care setting to better able to develop evaluations and questions to achieve best innovative practices within their organization.
d4521d80-f1a7-4e6d-8bf0-c6748e97e0ec.name: Health Care Innovation

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this credential, learners must earn a 70% mark or higher on all summative module quizzes within Health Care Innovation.

c3f5b8a5-5b0a-4cd8-b295-b522dc6b1a1a.description: This badge represents five (5) professional CEU credit as earned through the completion of the requirements of a Wharton Online program of study. Earners are eligible to use these CEUs where applicable to demonstrate current and refined business-oriented skills and to fulfill professional requirements. These CEUs meet the rigorous IACET CEU standard and will remain active in good standing for seven (7) years.
c3f5b8a5-5b0a-4cd8-b295-b522dc6b1a1a.name: 5 Continuing Education Units (CEUs)

badge_template_activities.title: To be eligible for this credential, learners must earn a 70% mark or higher on all summative module quizzes in a CEU-eligible Wharton Online course of study. Wharton Online CEUs meet the rigorous IACET CEU standard for continuing education and training.

507d8d2b-9582-4a0f-acf3-9b4d033cae54.description: A comprehensive business and leadership program in partnership with Wharton, the #1-ranked business school in the United States. This online program encompasses both asynchronous coursework as well as synchronous learning sessions with Wharton faculty. It was designed to enhance the skills of global Ternium executives by equipping them with tools to define their own success in the realms of organizational culture, change leadership, and strategic management.
507d8d2b-9582-4a0f-acf3-9b4d033cae54.name: Wharton-Ternium Global Leaders Executive Program

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this credential, participants must attend all synchronous sessions, must earn a 70% mark or higher on all summative module quizzes, and must complete all assignments with a passing grade within the Wharton-Ternium Global Leaders Executive Program.

bdd2f011-63b9-416b-9bde-442e669ef759.description: Earners of this badge have developed the key skills to understand Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning as it applies to HR Management. They also understand the role of data in machine learning, AI application, limitations of using data in HR decisions, and how bias can be mitigated using blockchain technology.
bdd2f011-63b9-416b-9bde-442e669ef759.name: AI Applications in People Management

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this credential, participants must attend must complete all assignments with a passing grade within the course.

6a6e09a3-b74a-4360-868b-015669987647.description: Earners of this badge have developed the key skills to incorporate such tools as Teachable Machine and TensorFlow into your business. They have also learned different ML methods, Deep Learning, as well as the limitations but also how to drive accuracy and use the best training data for algorithms.
6a6e09a3-b74a-4360-868b-015669987647.name: AI Fundamentals for Non-Data Scientists

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this credential, learners must earn a 70% mark or higher on all summative module quizzes within the course.

4260aa49-ec17-4d87-bf6e-3fc3c5353b55.description: Earners of this badge have learned the key elements needed to effectively manage people. They have developed methods to motivate individuals and reward systems for high performance. They have honed their skills to make good and timely management decisions that will impact change in their organization’s architecture.
4260aa49-ec17-4d87-bf6e-3fc3c5353b55.name: Managing Social and Human Capital

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this credential, learners must earn a 70% mark or higher on all summative module quizzes within Managing Social and Human Capital. This represents the learning and mastery of concepts covered in the following modules: Motivation and Incentives; Tasks, Jobs, and Systems of Work; Making Good and Timely Management Decisions; Designing and Changing the Organization’s Architecture
